txt.en: 'Welcome to Lothlórien, [placeholder], your efforts on our behalf have proven you a friend to the Elves.\n\n'You may wish to visit the glades of Egladil during your stay. Maliriel, the Mistress of the Feast, is known throughout Lothlórien for the grand banquets she prepares in honour of special occasions and important guests.'

'Welcome to Lothlórien, [placeholder], your efforts on our behalf have proven you a friend to the Elves.\n\n'You may wish to visit the glades of Egladil during your stay. The Mistress of the Feast is known throughout Lothlórien for the grand banquets she prepares in honour of special occasions and important guests.'

'Welcome to Imlad Lalaith, [placeholder]! Here we prepare the great banquets of Lothlórien whenever momentous occasion arises.

'Even now, we are making ready to honour a group of important guests who have travelled a long and weary road to reach us, but we are short-handed, as many have taken up the blade and bow to guard the borders of Lothlórien in this darkening age.

'Perhaps you could aid us?'

You have been acknowledged a friend of Lothlórien through your efforts on behalf of the Elves.\n\nYou should visit the glades of Hythe, well to the south and east, along the banks of the river Anduin.

'Welcome to Lothlórien, [placeholder], your efforts on our behalf have proven you a friend to the Elves.\n\n'You may wish to visit the glades of Egladil during your stay. The Mistress of the Feast is known throughout Lothlórien for the grand banquets she prepares in honour of special occasions and important guests.'
Talk to Maliriel at Imlad Lalaith

Maliriel can be found in the field of Imlad Lalaith in the eastern reaches of Egladil, along the banks of the river Anduin.\n\nYou have been asked to introduce yourself to Maliriel, the Mistress of the Feast for Lothlórien.
